channel.title: Large Caps on Off The Clock Maven
channel.description: Recent content in Large Caps on Off The Clock Maven

item.title: The Small-Cap Spring: Why the Market's Forgotten Players Are Poised for a Major Comeback
item.description: An in-depth analysis of the historic valuation gap between small-cap and large-cap stocks. This report explores the potential for a significant small-cap rebound, driven by catalysts like Federal Reserve policy shifts, broadening economic growth, and increased M&A activity.
